text: Aap poochiye kay asmanon aur zamin ka perwerdigar kaun hai? Keh dijiye! Allah . Keh dijiye! Kiya tum phir bhi iss kay siwa auron ko himayati bana rahey ho jo khud apni jaan kay bhi bhalay buray ka ikhtiyar nahi rakhtay. Keh dijiye kay kiya andha aur beena barabar hosakta hai? Ya kiya andheriyan aur roshni barabar hosakti hai. Kiya jinhen yeh Allah kay shareek thehra rahey hain unhon ney bhi Allah ki tarah makhlooq peda ki hai kay inn ki nazar mein pedaeesh mushtaba hogaee ho keh dijiye kay sirf Allah hi tamam cheezon ka khaliq hai who akela hai aur zabardast ghalib hai
